description: Describes an existing snapshot job. Poll job descriptions after a job starts to know the status of the job. For information on available status codes, see JobStatus.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that the dashboard snapshot job is executed in.

parameters.name: DashboardId
parameters.description: The ID of the dashboard that you have started a snapshot job for.

parameters.name: SnapshotJobId
parameters.description: The ID of the job to be described. The job ID is set when you start a new job with a StartDashboardSnapshotJob API call.

nested_items.name: AwsAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that the dashboard snapshot job is executed in.

nested_items.name: DashboardId
nested_items.description: The ID of the dashboard that you have started a snapshot job for.

nested_items.name: SnapshotJobId
nested_items.description: The ID of the job to be described. The job ID is set when you start a new job with a StartDashboardSnapshotJob API call.

nested_items.name: UserConfiguration
nested_items.description: The user configuration for the snapshot job. This information is provided when you make a StartDashboardSnapshotJob API call.

nested_items.name: AnonymousUsers
nested_items.description: An array of records that describe anonymous users that the dashboard snapshot is generated for. Sensitive user information is excluded.

nested_items.name: RowLevelPermissionTagKeys
nested_items.description: The tag keys for the RowLevelPermissionTags.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SnapshotConfiguration
nested_items.description: The snapshot configuration of the job. This information is provided when you make a StartDashboardSnapshotJob API call.

nested_items.name: FileGroups
nested_items.description: A list of SnapshotJobResultFileGroup objects that contain information about the snapshot that is generated. This list can hold a maximum of 6 FileGroup configurations.

nested_items.name: Files
nested_items.description: A list of SnapshotFile objects that contain the information on the snapshot files that need to be generated. This structure can hold 1 configuration at a time.

nested_items.name: SheetSelections
nested_items.description: A list of SnapshotFileSheetSelection objects that contain information on the dashboard sheet that is exported. These objects provide information about the snapshot artifacts that are generated during the job. This structure can hold a maximum of 5 CSV configurations, 5 Excel configurations, or 1 configuration for PDF.

nested_items.name: SheetId
nested_items.description: The sheet ID of the dashboard to generate the snapshot artifact from. This value is required for CSV, Excel, and PDF format types.

nested_items.name: SelectionScope
nested_items.description: The selection scope of the visuals on a sheet of a dashboard that you are generating a snapthot of. You can choose one of the following options.
ALL_VISUALS - Selects all visuals that are on the sheet. This value is required if the snapshot is a PDF.
SELECTED_VISUALS - Select the visual that you want to add to the snapshot. This value is required if the snapshot is a CSV or Excel workbook.

nested_items.name: VisualIds
nested_items.description: A structure that lists the IDs of the visuals in the selected sheet. Supported visual types are table, pivot table visuals. This value is required if you are generating a CSV or Excel workbook. This value supports a maximum of 1 visual ID for CSV and 5 visual IDs across up to 5 sheet selections for Excel. If you are generating an Excel workbook, the order of the visual IDs provided in this structure determines the order of the worksheets in the Excel file.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: FormatType
nested_items.description: The format of the snapshot file to be generated. You can choose between CSV, Excel, or PDF.

nested_items.name: DestinationConfiguration
nested_items.description: A structure that contains information on the Amazon S3 bucket that the generated snapshot is stored in.

nested_items.name: S3Destinations
nested_items.description: A list of SnapshotS3DestinationConfiguration objects that contain Amazon S3 destination configurations. This structure can hold a maximum of 1 S3DestinationConfiguration.

nested_items.name: BucketConfiguration
nested_items.description: A structure that contains details about the Amazon S3 bucket that the generated dashboard snapshot is saved in.

nested_items.name: BucketName
nested_items.description: The name of an existing Amazon S3 bucket where the generated snapshot artifacts are sent.

nested_items.name: BucketPrefix
nested_items.description: The prefix of the Amazon S3 bucket that the generated snapshots are stored in.

nested_items.name: BucketRegion
nested_items.description: The region that the Amazon S3 bucket is located in. The bucket must be located in the same region that the StartDashboardSnapshotJob API call is made.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: A list of Amazon QuickSight parameters and the list's override values.

nested_items.name: StringParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters that have a data type of string.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A display name for a string parameter.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The values of a string parameter.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: IntegerParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters that have a data type of integer.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the integer parameter.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The values for the integer parameter.
(integer) ---

nested_items.name: DecimalParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters that have a data type of decimal.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A display name for the decimal parameter.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The values for the decimal parameter.
(float) ---

nested_items.name: DateTimeParameters
nested_items.description: The parameters that have a data type of date-time.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: A display name for the date-time parameter.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The values for the date-time parameter.
(datetime) ---

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the snapshot job. The job ARN is generated when you start a new job with a StartDashboardSnapshotJob API call.

nested_items.name: JobStatus
nested_items.description: Indicates the status of a job. The status updates as the job executes. This shows one of the following values.
COMPLETED - The job was completed successfully.
FAILED - The job failed to execute.
QUEUED - The job is queued and hasn't started yet.
RUNNING - The job is still running.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The time that the snapshot job was created.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The time that the snapshot job status was last updated.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
